variables.name: Sex
variables.description: Gender of the passenger (male or female)

variables.name: Age
variables.description: Age of the passenger in years

variables.name: SibSp
variables.description: Number of siblings or spouses aboard the Titanic

variables.name: Parch
variables.description: Number of parents or children aboard the Titanic

variables.name: Embarked
variables.description: Port of Embarkation (C = Cherbourg; Q = Queenstown; S = Southampton)
